channel.title: How do i make the client sign in to my no-ip ip
channel.description: so i alreaddy portforwarded and got an no-ip account. i got the client and everything. i just need 2 know how do i make my client log on to my ip.

item.title: How do i make the client sign in to my no-ip ip
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Client.java Or Gui.java, Open up one of them Dont remember which one but try both, Use, “crtl + f” Then search for, 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0, then change them to your Ip eg, rune-jynx.no-ip.info. then compile, Its been a while sence i made rsps’s So not 100% hope it helped you

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make the client sign in to my no-ip ip
